00006 void
00007 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::ctor(SgAsmElfRelocSection *section)
00008 {
00009     ROSE_ASSERT(section->get_entries()!=NULL);
00010     section->get_entries()->get_entries().push_back(this);
00011     ROSE_ASSERT(section->get_entries()->get_entries().size()>0);
00012     set_parent(section->get_entries());
00013 }

00015 /* Parsers */
00016 void
00017 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::parse(ByteOrder sex, const Elf32RelaEntry_disk *disk)
00018 {
00019     p_r_offset    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_offset);
00020     p_r_addend    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_addend);
00021     uint64_t info = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_info);
00022     p_sym = info >> 8;
00023     p_type = (RelocType)(info & 0xff);
00024 }
00025 void
00026 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::parse(ByteOrder sex, const Elf64RelaEntry_disk *disk)
00027 {
00028     p_r_offset    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_offset);
00029     p_r_addend    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_addend);
00030     uint64_t info = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_info);
00031     p_sym = info >> 32;
00032     p_type = (RelocType)(info & 0xffffffff);
00033 }
00034 void
00035 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::parse(ByteOrder sex, const Elf32RelEntry_disk *disk)
00036 {
00037     p_r_offset    = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_offset);
00038     p_r_addend    = 0;
00039     uint64_t info = disk_to_host(sex, disk->r_info);
00040     p_sym = info >> 8;
00041     p_type = (RelocType)(info & 0xff);
00042 }

00052 
00053 /* Encode a native entry back into disk format */
00054 void *
00055 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf32RelaEntry_disk *disk) const
00056 {
00057     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_offset, &(disk->r_offset));
00058     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_addend, &(disk->r_addend));
00059     uint64_t info = (p_sym<<8) | (p_type & 0xff);
00060     host_to_disk(sex, info, &(disk->r_info));
00061     return disk;
00062 }
00063 void *
00064 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf64RelaEntry_disk *disk) const
00065 {
00066     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_offset, &(disk->r_offset));
00067     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_addend, &(disk->r_addend));
00068     uint64_t info = ((uint64_t)p_sym<<32) | (p_type & 0xffffffff);
00069     host_to_disk(sex, info, &(disk->r_info));
00070     return disk;
00071 }
00072 void *
00073 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf32RelEntry_disk *disk) const
00074 {
00075     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_offset, &(disk->r_offset));
00076     ROSE_ASSERT(0==p_r_addend);
00077     uint64_t info = (p_sym<<8) | (p_type & 0xff);
00078     host_to_disk(sex, info, &(disk->r_info));
00079     return disk;
00080 }
00081 void *
00082 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::encode(ByteOrder sex, Elf64RelEntry_disk *disk) const
00083 {
00084     host_to_disk(sex, p_r_offset, &(disk->r_offset));
00085     ROSE_ASSERT(0==p_r_addend);
00086     uint64_t info = ((uint64_t)p_sym<<32) | (p_type & 0xffffffff);
00087     host_to_disk(sex, info, &(disk->r_info));
00088     return disk;
00089 }

00091 /* Change symbol to string. TODO, needs to handle multiple architectures [MCB] */
00092 std::string
00093 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::reloc_name() const
00094 {
00095 #ifndef _MSC_VER
00096         return stringifySgAsmElfRelocEntryRelocType(get_type());
00097 #else
00098         ROSE_ASSERT(false);
00099         return "";
00100 #endif

00102 
00104 void
00105 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx, SgAsmElfSymbolSection *symtab) const
00106 {
00107     char p[4096];
00108     if (idx>=0) {
00109         sprintf(p, "%sElfRelocEntry[%zd]", prefix, idx);
00110     } else {
00111         sprintf(p, "%sElfRelocEntry", prefix);
00112     }
00113     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00114 
00115     /* compact one-line-per-reloc format */
00116     if (0==idx) {
00117         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s   %-10s %-20s %-10s %4s %-10s %s\n",
00118                 p, w, "", "Offset", "Type", "Addend", "Sym", "Value", "Name + Addend");
00119     }
00120 
00121     /* Offset */
00122     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = 0x%08"PRIx64, p, w, "", p_r_offset);
00123 
00124     /* Type */
00125     SgAsmGenericHeader* header = SageInterface::getEnclosingNode<SgAsmGenericHeader>(this);
00126     if (header) {
00127         fprintf(f, " %-20s", reloc_name().c_str());
00128     } else {
00129         fprintf(f, " 0x%02zx                ", (size_t)p_type);
00130     }
00131 
00132     /* Addend */
00133     if (p_r_addend) {
00134         fprintf(f, " 0x%08"PRIx64, p_r_addend);
00135     } else {
00136         fprintf(f, " %10s", "");
00137     }
00138 
00139     /* Symbol index */
00140     fprintf(f, " %4lu", p_sym);
00141 
00142     /* Symbol value and name */
00143     if (!symtab) {
00144         fprintf(f, " %10s <no symtab>", "");
00145     } else if (p_sym>=symtab->get_symbols()->get_symbols().size()) {
00146         fprintf(f, " %10s <out of range>", "");
00147     } else {
00148         SgAsmGenericSymbol *sym = symtab->get_symbols()->get_symbols()[p_sym];
00149         fprintf(f, " 0x%08"PRIx64" %s", sym->get_value(), sym->get_name()->get_string(true).c_str());
00150     }
00151 
00152     /* Addend in decimal */
00153     if (p_r_addend)
00154         fprintf(f, " + %"PRIu64, p_r_addend);
00155     fputc('\n', f);
00156 
00157     /* Auxiliary data */
00158     if (p_extra.size()>0) {
00159         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %zu bytes\n", p, w, ".extra", p_extra.size());
00160         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"extra at ", p_extra);
00161     }
00162 }

00165 void
00166 SgAsmElfRelocSection::ctor(SgAsmElfSymbolSection *symbols, SgAsmElfSection *targetsec/*=NULL*/)
00167 {
00168     p_entries = new SgAsmElfRelocEntryList;
00169     p_entries->set_parent(this);
00170     p_linked_section = symbols;         // may be null
00171     p_target_section = targetsec;
00172 }
00173 
00175 SgAsmElfRelocSection *
00176 SgAsmElfRelocSection::parse()
00177 {
00178     SgAsmElfSection::parse();
00179 
00180     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = get_elf_header();
00181     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr);
00182 
00183     size_t entry_size, struct_size, extra_size, nentries;
00184     calculate_sizes(&entry_size, &struct_size, &extra_size, &nentries);
00185     ROSE_ASSERT(extra_size==0);
00186     
00187     /* Parse each entry */
00188     for (size_t i=0; i<nentries; i++) {
00189         SgAsmElfRelocEntry *entry = 0;
00190         if (4==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00191             if (p_uses_addend) {
00192                 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelaEntry_disk disk;
00193                 read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00194                 entry = new SgAsmElfRelocEntry(this);
00195                 entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00196             } else {
00197                 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelEntry_disk disk;
00198                 read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00199                 entry = new SgAsmElfRelocEntry(this);
00200                 entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00201             }
00202         } else if (8==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00203             if (p_uses_addend) {
00204                 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelaEntry_disk disk;
00205                 read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00206                 entry = new SgAsmElfRelocEntry(this);
00207                 entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00208             } else {
00209                 SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelEntry_disk disk;
00210                 read_content_local(i*entry_size, &disk, struct_size);
00211                 entry = new SgAsmElfRelocEntry(this);
00212                 entry->parse(fhdr->get_sex(), &disk);
00213             }
00214         } else {
00215             throw FormatError("unsupported ELF word size");
00216         }
00217         if (extra_size>0)
00218             entry->get_extra() = read_content_local_ucl(i*entry_size+struct_size, extra_size);
00219     }
00220     return this;
00221 }
00222 
00224 rose_addr_t
00225 SgAsmElfRelocSection::calculate_sizes(size_t *entsize, size_t *required, size_t *optional, size_t *entcount) const
00226 {
00227     rose_addr_t retval=0;
00228     std::vector<size_t> extra_sizes;
00229     for (size_t i=0; i<p_entries->get_entries().size(); i++)
00230         extra_sizes.push_back(p_entries->get_entries()[i]->get_extra().size());
00231     if (p_uses_addend) {
00232         retval =  calculate_sizes(sizeof(SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelaEntry_disk),
00233                                   sizeof(SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelaEntry_disk),
00234                                   extra_sizes, entsize, required, optional, entcount);
00235     } else {
00236         retval =  calculate_sizes(sizeof(SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelEntry_disk),
00237                                   sizeof(SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelEntry_disk),
00238                                   extra_sizes, entsize, required, optional, entcount);
00239     }
00240     return retval;
00241 }

00244 bool
00245 SgAsmElfRelocSection::reallocate()
00246 {
00247     bool reallocated = SgAsmElfSection::reallocate();
00248     
00249     /* Update parts of the section and segment tables not updated by superclass */
00250     SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry *secent = get_section_entry();
00251     if (secent)
00252         secent->set_sh_type(p_uses_addend ?
00253                             SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry::SHT_RELA :
00254                             SgAsmElfSectionTableEntry::SHT_REL);
00255 
00256     return reallocated;
00257 }
00258 
00260 void
00261 SgAsmElfRelocSection::unparse(std::ostream &f) const
00262 {
00263     SgAsmElfFileHeader *fhdr = get_elf_header();
00264     ROSE_ASSERT(fhdr);
00265     ByteOrder sex = fhdr->get_sex();
00266 
00267     size_t entry_size, struct_size, extra_size, nentries;
00268     calculate_sizes(&entry_size, &struct_size, &extra_size, &nentries);
00269 
00270     /* Adjust the entry size stored in the ELF Section Table */
00271     get_section_entry()->set_sh_entsize(entry_size);
00272 
00273     /* Write each entry's required part followed by the optional part */
00274     for (size_t i=0; i<nentries; i++) {
00275         SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelaEntry_disk diska32;
00276         SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelaEntry_disk diska64;
00277         SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf32RelEntry_disk  disk32;
00278         SgAsmElfRelocEntry::Elf64RelEntry_disk  disk64;
00279         void *disk  = NULL;
00280 
00281         SgAsmElfRelocEntry *entry = p_entries->get_entries()[i];
00282 
00283         if (4==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00284             if (p_uses_addend) {
00285                 disk = entry->encode(sex, &diska32);
00286             } else {
00287                 disk = entry->encode(sex, &disk32);
00288             }
00289         } else if (8==fhdr->get_word_size()) {
00290             if (p_uses_addend) {
00291                 disk = entry->encode(sex, &diska64);
00292             } else {
00293                 disk = entry->encode(sex, &disk64);
00294             }
00295         } else {
00296             ROSE_ASSERT(!"unsupported word size");
00297         }
00298 
00299         rose_addr_t spos = i * entry_size;
00300         spos = write(f, spos, struct_size, disk);
00301 #if 0 /*FIXME: padding not supported here yet (RPM 2008-10-13)*/
00302         if (entry->get_extra().size()>0) {
00303             ROSE_ASSERT(entry->get_extra().size()<=extra_size);
00304             write(f, spos, entry->get_extra());
00305         }
00306 #endif
00307     }
00308 
00309     unparse_holes(f);
00310 }
00311 
00313 void
00314 SgAsmElfRelocSection::dump(FILE *f, const char *prefix, ssize_t idx) const
00315 {
00316     char p[4096];
00317     if (idx>=0) {
00318         sprintf(p, "%sRelocSection[%zd].", prefix, idx);
00319     } else {
00320         sprintf(p, "%sRelocSection.", prefix);
00321     }
00322     const int w = std::max(1, DUMP_FIELD_WIDTH-(int)strlen(p));
00323 
00324     SgAsmElfSection::dump(f, p, -1);
00325     SgAsmElfSymbolSection *symtab = dynamic_cast<SgAsmElfSymbolSection*>(get_linked_section());
00326     fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = %s\n", p, w, "uses_addend", p_uses_addend ? "yes" : "no");
00327 
00328     if (p_target_section) {
00329         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = [%d] \"%s\"\n", p, w, "target_section",
00330                 p_target_section->get_id(), p_target_section->get_name()->get_string(true).c_str());
00331     } else {
00332         fprintf(f, "%s%-*s = NULL\n", p, w, "target_section");
00333     }
00334 
00335     for (size_t i=0; i<p_entries->get_entries().size(); i++) {
00336         SgAsmElfRelocEntry *ent = p_entries->get_entries()[i];
00337         ent->dump(f, p, i, symtab);
00338     }
00339 
00340     if (variantT() == V_SgAsmElfRelocSection) //unless a base class
00341         hexdump(f, 0, std::string(p)+"data at ", p_data);
00342 }
